Plot: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.
Title: Titan A.E.
Writer: Hans Bauer (story), Randall McCormick (story), Ben Edlund (screenplay), John August (screenplay), Joss Whedon (screenplay)
Actors: Matt Damon, Bill Pullman, John Leguizamo, Nathan Lane
tomatoConsensus: Great visuals, but the story feels like a cut-and-paste job of other sci-fi movies.
Director: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman, Art Vitello
